page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE....
page.content: {AT HALF PAST SEVEN IN THE MORNING MY ALARM GOES OFF.IGET UP AND GET DRESSED AND GO DOWNSTAIRS,I OPEN THE FRONT ROOM CURTAINS AND GET MY BREAKFAST,BEANS ON TOAST.I GO UPSTAIRS AND GET WASHED AND CLEAN MY TEETH,I THEN WATCH TELEVISION OR READ UNTIL TWENTY TO NINE.THEN I SET OFF TO SCHOOL,I GET A LIFT UP BY SOME FRIENDS SO I DON'T HAVE TO WALK UP THE BANK. I GET TO SCHOOL AT ABOUT TEN TO NINE. WE GO TO ASSEMBLY AND THEN REGISTRATION,TODAY IS FRIDAY SO WE HAVE ENVIRONMENTAL STUDIES, R.E., FRENCH AND THEN ENGLISH.ENGLISH IS TERRIBLE ON A FRIDAY BECAUSE MR MORGAN IS ALWAYS IN A BAD MOOD. I WALK DOWN THE BANK WITH SASHA. I GET HOME AT ABOUT FOUR O'CLOCK, I DO MY HOMEWORK, AND SIT INFRONT OF THE TELEVISION, I HAVE MY TEA AT ABOUT FIVE O'CLOCK AND THEN SET OFF FOR THE CARAVAN.
